comment: The layout is a bit weird at first but you can use to it. The biggest problem is with the history section which is in an oldest to newest order now so I have to scroll to the top to see the latest translation which is ridiculous. A sort button would be useful.
scenarios: Viewing the history section and having to scroll to the top to see the latest translation due to the oldest-to-newest order.
key sentence: Viewing the history section and having to scroll to the top to see the latest translation due to the oldest-to-newest order.
the function of activity: The activity facilitates translation and navigation:Search, menu, navigate, history, handwriting, options, text entry, paste, language swap, and settings management for user interaction and feedback.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'History', 'description': 'View translation history'}, {'name': 'Save Translation', 'description': 'Save the current translation to a phrasebook'}]
